summary: The weapon from the mortal body of  High King chicken.... wait... what...
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://oi58.tinypic.com/otho2f.jpg[/img][/center]
[size=5][font=Verdana]
This mod was made for fun and request from the Top 5 Skyrim Mods of the Week : [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ER1-cx_32uc]Morrowind and Oblivion Mod Special![/url]
This is the weapon mentioned on the video:[url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Battleaxe_of_Hatred]Battleaxe of Hatred (Oblivion)[/url]



Chickens are planning something and to prevent their evil plans [u]The Battleaxe of Hatred[/u] was forged with the body of his previous king.[/font][/size]




[color=#ff3333][font=Trebuchet MS][i][size=4]This is the only information I have[font=Verdana] found[/font], but it is a very reliable source.[/size][/i][/font][/color]

[center][img]http://oi61.tinypic.com/2yudjd4.jpg[/img][/center]


[size=4][font=Verdana][i]Sorry for me awful english :S

[/i][/font][/size]
[center][size=4][font=Verdana][i][img]http://oi57.tinypic.com/mtt1u9.jpg[/img][/i][/font][/size]
[/center]
[size=4][font=Verdana]
Now going to real data about the weapon

-BattleAxe 2H
-Damage: 28
-Wheight: 22
-Value: 666
[color=#336666][i]*Barely faster than others Battleaxe[/i]
*[i]Custom Equip Sound[/i][/color]

Recipe: Type: Daedric
- 2x [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Ebony_Ingot]Ebony Ingot[/url]
- 1x [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Daedra_Heart_%28Skyrim%29]Daedra Heart[/url]
- 1x [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Human_Heart_%28Skyrim%29]Human Heart[/url]
- 1x [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Briar_Heart]Briar Heart[/url]

Temper:
- 1x [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Skooma_%28Skyrim%29]Skooma[/url]

[/font][/size]
[center][img=400x300]http://oi59.tinypic.com/2qn9o5h.jpg[/img]
[size=4][font=Verdana][color=#cccc66][size=6][font=Trebuchet MS]That's all, its a weapon for fun just ENJOY !!![/font][/size][/color][/font][/size][/center]
author: Dumitas
